verses.roman:
etad viditvā tu bhavān
mayāpovāhito raṇāt
upasṛṣṭaḥ pareṇeti
mūrcchito gadayā hataḥ

synonyms: etat—this; viditvā—knowing; tu—indeed; bhavān—You; mayā—by me; apovāhitaḥ—removed; raṇāt—from the battlefield; upasṛṣṭaḥ—hurt; pareṇa—by the enemy; iti—thus thinking; mūrcchitaḥ—unconscious; gadayā—by his club; hataḥ—struck.
translation: With this rule in mind, I removed You from the battlefield, since You had been struck unconscious by Your enemy's club and I thought You were seriously injured.
